pr_title: Fix checking program ID with quotes #477

timeline.message: fix: Fix checking program ID with quotes #477

timeline.author: grianbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+/*

+ * The term "Broadcom" refers to Broadcom Inc. and/or its subsidiaries.

+ *

+package com.ca.lsp.cobol.usecases;
+
+import com.ca.lsp.cobol.usecases.engine.UseCaseEngine;
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
+
+import java.util.List;
+import java.util.Map;
+
+/** This use case checks that the program ID check works correctly even with quotes */
+class TestProgramIdWithQuotes {
+
+  private static final String TEXT_WITH_SINGLE_QUOTES =
+      "       IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       PROGRAM-ID. 'TEST1'.\n"
+          + "       DATA DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       PROCEDURE DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       END PROGRAM 'TEST1'.";
+
+  private static final String TEXT_WITH_DOUBLE_QUOTES =
+      "       IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       PROGRAM-ID. \"TEST1\".\n"
+          + "       DATA DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       PROCEDURE DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       END PROGRAM \"TEST1\".";
+
+  private static final String TEXT_WITH_ID_QUOTED =
+      "       IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       PROGRAM-ID. 'TEST1'.\n"
+          + "       DATA DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       PROCEDURE DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       END PROGRAM TEST1.";
+
+  private static final String TEXT_WITH_END_QUOTED =
+      "       IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       PROGRAM-ID. TEST1.\n"
+          + "       DATA DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       PROCEDURE DIVISION.\n"
+          + "       END PROGRAM 'TEST1'.";
+
+  @Test
+  void test() {
+    UseCaseEngine.runTest(TEXT_WITH_SINGLE_QUOTES, List.of(), Map.of());
+    UseCaseEngine.runTest(TEXT_WITH_DOUBLE_QUOTES, List.of(), Map.of());
+    UseCaseEngine.runTest(TEXT_WITH_ID_QUOTED, List.of(), Map.of());
+    UseCaseEngine.runTest(TEXT_WITH_END_QUOTED, List.of(), Map.of());
+  }

timeline.message: fix: Fix checking program ID with quotes #477
fix: Fix checking program ID with quotes #477
